Method.name: GetPrintInfo
Method.Implementation:
s ^tempwml("GetPrintInfo")=$lb(InString,IsPreview)
s AdmId=$P(InString,"^",1) s AdmType=$P(InString,"^",3) ;s curLoc=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") ;s curUser=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") s curLoc=117 s curUser=7058 s ^tempwml("curLoc")=$lb(curLoc,curUser) i AdmType'="CRM" { i AdmType="IADM" { s Flag=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).HaveNoPayedItem(AdmId) //q:(Flag="1")&&(IsPreview="Y") "NoPayed" q:(Flag="1") "NoPayed" s AdmId=$p($g(^DHCPEIADM(AdmId)),"^",4) }else{ s AdmId=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",AdmId,0)) s Flag=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).HaveNoPayedItem(AdmId) //q:(Flag="1")&&(IsPreview="Y") "NoPayed" q:(Flag="1") "NoPayed" s AdmId=$p($g(^DHCPEIADM(AdmId)),"^",4) } }
s BaseInfo=..GetPatBaseInfo(AdmId) s ItemInfo=..GetItemInfo(AdmId) s CTNum=$P(ItemInfo,$C(5),2) s ItemInfo=$P(ItemInfo,$C(5),1) s AddItem=$P(ItemInfo,$C(4),1) s ItemInfo=$P(ItemInfo,$C(4),2) //s AddItem="1+2+3" s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_AddItem_"^"_CTNum
d ##class(web.DHCPE.AdmRecordManager).Insert(AdmId,"P","PrintDJD",curUser,"")
s iadm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",AdmId,0)) i iadm'="" d .s PAADM=$P(^DHCPEIADM(iadm),"^",1) .;d:PAADM'="" ..PatItemPrintFlag(PAADM)
q BaseInfo_$C(4)_ItemInfo

Method.name: GetPatBaseInfo
Method.Implementation:
;w ##class(web.DHCPE.PrintNewDirect).GetPatBaseInfo(977) s BaseId=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID),"^",1) //预登记个人基本信息表 q:BaseId="" s ParInfo=$g(^DHCPEPreIBI(BaseId)) s recheck=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetReCheckFlag(PreIADMID,"PreADM") s recheck=recheck+1 s recheck="第"_recheck_"次" s RegNo=$P(ParInfo,"^",1) ;s BarRegNo="*"_RegNo_"*" s BarRegNo=RegNo s HPNo=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID),"^",27) //体检号 s PatName = $P(ParInfo,"^",2) // 姓名
s PatMasID=$O(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",RegNo,0)) i PatMasID'="" d .s PatName=$P(^PAPER(PatMasID,"ALL"),"^",1) .s IDCardNo=$p(^PAPER(PatMasID,"PAT",3),"^",6) .s MaritalDR=$p($g(^PAPER(PatMasID,"PER",2)),"^",3) .S:MaritalDR'="" Marital=$P(^CT("MAR",MaritalDR),"^",2) s Position=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIADM","Position",PreIADMID)) //$P(ParInfo,"^",11) // 部门 i Position="" s Position=$P(ParInfo,"^",11) // 部门 s MobilePhone=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetTelNo("PIBI",BaseId) ;i MobilePhone="" s MobilePhone=$P(ParInfo,"^",7) ;i MobilePhone="" s MobilePhone=$P(ParInfo,"^",6) s Sex = $P(ParInfo,"^",3) // 性别 i Sex'="" d .s Sex=$p($g(^CT("SEX",Sex)),"^",2)
s PatAge = $P(ParInfo,"^",4) // 年龄 s PatAge=##class(web.DHCLCNUREXCUTE).CalAge(PatAge,+$h) s PatAge=$P(PatAge,"Y",1) s RegDate="" s iadm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",PreIADMID,0)) i iadm'="" d .s Status=$p(^DHCPEIADM(iadm),"^",8) .i Status="ARRIVED" d ..s RegDate=$p(^DHCPEIADM(iadm),"^",5) ..i RegDate'="" s RegDate=$ZD(RegDate,3) .e d ..s RegDate=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID),"^",4) //+$H ..s VIPID="",VIPDesc="" ..s VIPID=$p($g(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID)),"^",18) ..s:(VIPID'="") VIPDesc=$p($G(^DHCPEVIPLevel("VIP",VIPID)),"^",2) ..s:((VIPDesc["VIP")||(VIPDesc["vip"))&&((VIPID'="")) RegDate=$p($g(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID)),"^",4) .. ..i RegDate'="" s RegDate=$ZD(RegDate,3) s GADMDR=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID)),"^",2) s GTeam=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID)),"^",3) s SortNo="" s GTeamDesc="" s Company="个人"
i ""'=GADMDR d .;s RegDate=$ZD(+$H,3) .s GBIDR=$P($G(^DHCPEPreGADM(GADMDR)),"^",1) .s Company=$P($G(^DHCPEPreGBI(GBIDR)),"^",2) .s GTeamDesc="" .i GTeam'="" d ..s GTeamDesc=$p(^DHCPEPreGADM(+GTeam,"Team",$p(GTeam,"||",2)),"^",1) ..s Char=##class(web.DHCPE.PreIADM).NumToChar($p(GTeam,"||",2)) ..s SortNo=Char_$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIADM","GTEAM","IADM",PreIADMID)) .s Company=Company s:NetPreFlag=0 RegDate=$ZD(+$H,3) ;打印当前日期 2014-05-06 s OrderSetsDesc=##class(web.DHCPE.Query.IAdmItemStatus).GetArcSetDesc(PreIADMID)
s TotalFee=0 s TotalFee=##class(web.DHCPE.PreItemList).IGetOrdAmount(PreIADMID,"PERSON") s i=$l(TotalFee,$C(13)) s TotalFee=$p(TotalFee,$C(13),4) s TotalFee=$j(TotalFee,3,2) ;s TotalFee="总金额"_TotalFee
s DietDesc="" s Diet=##class(web.DHCPE.PreIADM).GetDietFlagByID(PreIADMID) i Diet=1 d .s DietDesc="早餐" s PhotoDesc="" s PhotoFlag=##class(web.DHCPE.PreIADM).GetPhotoFlag(PreIADMID) if PhotoFlag>0 d .s PhotoDesc="出片" s VIPLevel=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetVIPLevel("Pre",PreIADMID) s VIPType=$P(VIPLevel,"^",2)
s RoomPlace=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIADM","RoomPlace",PreIADMID)) s:RoomPlace'="" RoomPlace=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("RoomPlace",RoomPlace)),"^",2) s:RoomPlace'="" VIPType=VIPType_" "_RoomPlace
s SortForNorCus="" i VIPType'[("VIP") d .;s TotalFee="" .s CurLoc=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADMID),"^",26) .q:CurLoc'=53 .s SortForNorCus=..GetPatSortForNorCus(PreIADMID) e d .s PhotoDesc="" .s DietDesc="" s Position=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetPosition("PreADM",PreIADMID)
s BaseInfo=PatName_"^"_Sex_"^"_PatAge_"^"_MobilePhone_"^"_RegNo_"^"_BarRegNo s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_RegDate_"^"_OrderSetsDesc_"^"_Company_"^"_VIPType ;s DietDesc="早餐" ;s PhotoDesc="片子" s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_Position_"^"_TotalFee_"^"_DietDesc_"^"_PhotoDesc s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_SortForNorCus s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_$G(IDCardNo)_"^"_$G(Marital)_"^"_HPNo q BaseInfo

Method.name: GetPayedAmt
Method.Implementation: s TotalAmt=0 s PAID=0 f s PAID=$O(^DHCPEPreA(0,"CRMADM","I",PreIADM,PAID)) q:PAID="" d .s Status=$P(^DHCPEPreA(PAID),"^",21) .q:Status="NU" .s Status=$P(^DHCPEPreA(PAID),"^",14) .q:Status'="UNCHARGED" .s OneAmt=$P(^DHCPEPreA(PAID),"^",9) .s TotalAmt=TotalAmt+OneAmt q TotalAmt

Method.name: GetPatSortForNorCus
Method.Implementation:
;获取一个普通客户的排队序号，打印指引单的时候存在TCD25754||1和心脏彩超33055||1 s Sort="" i ""'=$G(^DHCPEPatSortForNorCus(PreIADM,"Sort",+$h)) q $G(^DHCPEPatSortForNorCus(PreIADM,"Sort",+$h))
s OtherStation=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","StationId_Other")) s NeedSortArcIdStr="^"_"25754||1"_"^"_"33055||1"_"^" s Flag=0 s ItemSub=0 f s ItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)) q:ItemSub="" d .s Stat=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",16) .q:Stat'="1" .s ArcimID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",1) .s STID=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,"")) .q:(STID="")||(STID=OtherStation) .s ArcimID="^"_ArcimID_"^" .s:NeedSortArcIdStr[ArcimID Flag=1 .q i Flag=1 d .s Sort=$I(^DHCPEPatSortForNorCus("PatSortForNorCus",+$h))+40 .s ^DHCPEPatSortForNorCus(PreIADM,"Sort",+$h)=Sort q Sort

Method.name: GetItemInfo
Method.Implementation:
s ^tmplx("GetItemInfo")=PreIADM /* .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1) .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) */ s ArcimIDStr="^"_"22172||1^33774||1"_"^" s NoPhotoArcimID="33649||1" s CTStation="13" s RaxStation="14" s NJStation="15" s CTNum=0 s RaxNum=0 s NJNum=0 s CTAppNum=0 s RaxAppNum=0 s NJAppNum=0 s IBInfoId=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM),"^",1) //预登记个人基本信息表 q:IBInfoId="" s IBInfo=$g(^DHCPEPreIBI(IBInfoId)) s IBSex = $P(IBInfo,"^",3) // 性别 i IBSex'="" d .s IBSex=$p($g(^CT("SEX",IBSex)),"^",2) /// 取出admid s Iadm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",PreIADM,0)) s PAADM=$P(^DHCPEIADM(Iadm),"^",1) s curUser=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") ;s curUser=7058 s BloodSpecNum=0 s OtherSpecNum=0 s BloodPatItemID="" s OtherPatItemID="" s AddItem="" s Job=$J k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job) k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job) s OtherStation=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","StationId_Other")) ;s LocID=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") s LocID=117 s NoPhotoFlag=0 if ($d(^DHCPEPatItemPrintFlag("PatItem","PrintFlag",PAADM))){ ///判断导诊单是否打印过 ADD BY YK s ItemSub=0 f s ItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)) q:ItemSub="" d .s Stat=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)),"^",16) .q:Stat'="1" .s CrmOrdID=$O(^DHCPECRMO(0,"CRMORI",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,0)) .s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) .q:(OrderItemID="")||($D(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","RefuseCheck",OrderItemID))) //add by liuxiang 2019-09-11 已经放弃的不打印 .s PrintRecord=+$O(^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,""),-1)+1 .s ^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,PrintRecord)=$H_"^"_curUser .s ItemNum=+$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","Qty",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub)) .s ArcimID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",1) .S ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID))+ItemNum .i ArcimID=NoPhotoArcimID s NoPhotoFlag="1" .s STID=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,"")) .q:(STID="")||(STID=OtherStation) .i STID=CTStation d ..s CTNum=CTNum+1 .i STID=RaxStation d ..s RaxNum=RaxNum+1 .i STID=NJStation d ..s NJNum=NJNum+1 .;PatItemID^ItemSort^ItemIsPrint^ItemPrintName .s PatItemInfo=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItemSort",ArcimID)) .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1)
.s ExeQFlag=0 .s AppFlag=0 .i CrmOrdID'="" d ..s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) ..i OrderItemID'="" d ...s SpecNo=$P(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$P(OrderItemID,"||",2),3),"^",20) ...s OEORIItemStatDR=$p($G(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$p(OrderItemID,"||",2),1)),"^",13) ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 AppFlag=1 ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 ExeQFlag=1 ...q:'$d(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","RefuseCheck",OrderItemID))&&(OEORIItemStatDR=6) /// 判断是否存在拒检项目 ...q:SpecNo="" ...q:$D(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)) ...s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)="" ...s SpecName=##class(web.DHCPE.BarPrint).GetSpecName(OrderItemID) ...i SpecName[("血") d ....s BloodSpecNum=BloodSpecNum+1 ....s BloodPatItemID=PatItemID ...e d ....s OtherSpecNum=OtherSpecNum+1 ....s OtherPatItemID=PatItemID .q:(ExeQFlag=1) .i AppFlag=1 d ..i STID=CTStation d ...s CTAppNum=CTNum+1 ..i STID=RaxStation d ...s RaxAppNum=RaxNum+1 ..i STID=NJStation d ...s NJAppNum=NJNum+1 .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) .i PatItemID'="" d ..s PatItemSort=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",2) ..s:PatItemSort="" PatItemSort="99999" .e d ..s PatItemSort="99999" .s:PatItemID="" PatItemID="99999" .s:ItemSort="" ItemSort="9999999999" .s:IsPrint="" IsPrint="Y" .s:PrintName="" PrintName=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).GetArcDesc(ArcimID)
.s SetID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",2) .s AddFlag=0 .i SetID="" d ..i AddItem="" d ...s AddItem=PrintName ..e d ...s AddItem=AddItem_"+"_PrintName ..s AddFlag=1 .s:IsPrint="N" PrintName="" .s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)=PrintName_"^"_AddFlag .b ;w5678 k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) s ItemInfo="" s PatItemSort="" f s PatItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort)) q:PatItemSort="" d .s PatItemID="" .f s PatItemID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID)) q:PatItemID="" d ..s OneInfo="" ..s PatItemName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",1) ..i PatItemName="" s PatItemName="没有分类"
..i PatItemID="5" d ;放射不出片 ...i NoPhotoFlag="1" d ....s PatItemName=PatItemName_"(不出片)"
..i PatItemID=BloodPatItemID d ...s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_BloodSpecNum_")" ..;i PatItemID=OtherPatItemID d ..;.s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_OtherSpecNum_")" ..s PatItemNotice=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID,"Place",LocID)) ..s DocFlag=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",6) ..s PatSignName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",7) ..s PatInfo=PatItemName_"^"_PatItemNotice_"^"_DocFlag_"^"_PatSignName ..s OneItemInfo="" ..s PrtFlag=0 ..s ItemSort="" ..f s ItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort)) q:ItemSort="" d ...s ArcimID="" ...f s ArcimID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) q:ArcimID="" d .... ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="男") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、前列腺超声需要憋尿" ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="女") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、妇科B超需要憋尿" ....i (ArcimIDStr[("^"_ArcimID_"^")) d .....s PrtFlag=1 ....b ;w4321 ....s OneArcInfo=$G(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) ....q:$P(OneArcInfo,"^",1)="" ....s ItemNum=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)) ....i ItemNum>1 s $p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)=$p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)_"*"_ItemNum ....i OneItemInfo="" d .....s OneItemInfo=OneArcInfo ....e d .....s OneItemInfo=OneItemInfo_$C(3)_OneArcInfo ...s:(PrtFlag=1) $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★阴式B超请先行妇科检查" ..s OneInfo=PatInfo_$C(2)_OneItemInfo ..i ItemInfo="" d ...s ItemInfo=OneInfo ..e d ...s ItemInfo=ItemInfo_$C(1)_OneInfo }else{ s ItemSub=0 f s ItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)) q:ItemSub="" d .s Stat=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)),"^",16) .q:Stat'="1" .s PrintRecord=+$O(^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,""),-1)+1 .s ^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,PrintRecord)=$H_"^"_curUser .s ItemNum=+$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","Qty",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub)) .s ArcimID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",1) .S ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID))+ItemNum .i ArcimID=NoPhotoArcimID s NoPhotoFlag="1" .s STID=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,"")) .q:(STID="")||(STID=OtherStation) .i STID=CTStation d ..s CTNum=CTNum+1 .i STID=RaxStation d ..s RaxNum=RaxNum+1 .i STID=NJStation d ..s NJNum=NJNum+1 .;PatItemID^ItemSort^ItemIsPrint^ItemPrintName .s PatItemInfo=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItemSort",ArcimID)) .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1) .s CrmOrdID=$O(^DHCPECRMO(0,"CRMORI",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,0)) .s ExeQFlag=0 .s AppFlag=0 .i CrmOrdID'="" d ..s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) ..i OrderItemID'="" d ...s SpecNo=$P(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$P(OrderItemID,"||",2),3),"^",20) ...s OEORIItemStatDR=$p($G(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$p(OrderItemID,"||",2),1)),"^",13) ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 AppFlag=1 ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 ExeQFlag=1 ...q:SpecNo="" ...q:$D(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)) ...s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)="" ...s SpecName=##class(web.DHCPE.BarPrint).GetSpecName(OrderItemID) ...i SpecName[("血") d ....s BloodSpecNum=BloodSpecNum+1 ....s BloodPatItemID=PatItemID ...e d ....s OtherSpecNum=OtherSpecNum+1 ....s OtherPatItemID=PatItemID .q:(ExeQFlag=1) .i AppFlag=1 d ..i STID=CTStation d ...s CTAppNum=CTNum+1 ..i STID=RaxStation d ...s RaxAppNum=RaxNum+1 ..i STID=NJStation d ...s NJAppNum=NJNum+1 .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) .i PatItemID'="" d ..s PatItemSort=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",2) ..s:PatItemSort="" PatItemSort="99999" .e d ..s PatItemSort="99999" .s:PatItemID="" PatItemID="99999" .s:ItemSort="" ItemSort="9999999999" .s:IsPrint="" IsPrint="Y" .s:PrintName="" PrintName=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).GetArcDesc(ArcimID)
.s SetID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",2) .s AddFlag=0 .i SetID="" d ..i AddItem="" d ...s AddItem=PrintName ..e d ...s AddItem=AddItem_"+"_PrintName ..s AddFlag=1 .s:IsPrint="N" PrintName="" .s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)=PrintName_"^"_AddFlag k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) s ItemInfo="" s PatItemSort="" f s PatItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort)) q:PatItemSort="" d .s PatItemID="" .f s PatItemID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID)) q:PatItemID="" d ..s OneInfo="" ..s PatItemName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",1) ..i PatItemName="" s PatItemName="没有分类"
..i PatItemID="5" d ;放射不出片 ...i NoPhotoFlag="1" d ....s PatItemName=PatItemName_"(不出片)"
..i PatItemID=BloodPatItemID d ...s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_BloodSpecNum_")" ..;i PatItemID=OtherPatItemID d ..;.s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_OtherSpecNum_")" ..s PatItemNotice=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID,"Place",LocID)) ..s DocFlag=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",6) ..s PatSignName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",7) ..s PatInfo=PatItemName_"^"_PatItemNotice_"^"_DocFlag_"^"_PatSignName ..s OneItemInfo="" ..s PrtFlag=0 ..s ItemSort="" ..f s ItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort)) q:ItemSort="" d ...s ArcimID="" ...f s ArcimID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) q:ArcimID="" d .... ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="男") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、前列腺超声需要憋尿" ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="女") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、妇科B超需要憋尿" ....i (ArcimIDStr[("^"_ArcimID_"^")) d .....s PrtFlag=1 ....b ;w12345 ....s OneArcInfo=$G(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) ....q:$P(OneArcInfo,"^",1)="" ....s ItemNum=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)) ....i ItemNum>1 s $p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)=$p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)_"*"_ItemNum ....i OneItemInfo="" d .....s OneItemInfo=OneArcInfo ....e d .....s OneItemInfo=OneItemInfo_$C(3)_OneArcInfo ...s:(PrtFlag=1) $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★阴式B超请先行妇科检查" ..s OneInfo=PatInfo_$C(2)_OneItemInfo ..i ItemInfo="" d ...s ItemInfo=OneInfo ..e d ...s ItemInfo=ItemInfo_$C(1)_OneInfo
} k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job) K ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job) q AddItem_$C(4)_ItemInfo_$C(5)_CTNum_"("_CTAppNum_")"_"^"_RaxNum_"("_RaxAppNum_")"_"^"_NJNum_"("_NJAppNum_")"

Method.name: GetDelayPrintInfo
Method.Description: 获取延检项目打印的信息 add by wangminglong 2019-3-22 start w ##class(web.DHCPE.PrintNewDirect).GetDelayPrintInfo("708^^CRM")
Method.Implementation:
s ^tempwml("GetDelayPrintInfo")=$lb(InString,IsPreview)
s AdmId=$P(InString,"^",1) s AdmType=$P(InString,"^",3) ;s curLoc=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") ;s curUser=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") s curLoc=117 s curUser=7058 s ^tempwml("curLoc")=$lb(curLoc,curUser) i AdmType'="CRM" { i AdmType="IADM" { s Flag=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).HaveNoPayedItem(AdmId) //q:(Flag="1")&&(IsPreview="Y") "NoPayed" q:(Flag="1") "NoPayed" s AdmId=$p($g(^DHCPEIADM(AdmId)),"^",4) }else{ s AdmId=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",AdmId,0)) s Flag=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).HaveNoPayedItem(AdmId) //q:(Flag="1")&&(IsPreview="Y") "NoPayed" q:(Flag="1") "NoPayed" s AdmId=$p($g(^DHCPEIADM(AdmId)),"^",4) } }
s BaseInfo=..GetPatBaseInfo(AdmId) s ItemInfo=..GetDelayItemInfo(AdmId) s CTNum=$P(ItemInfo,$C(5),2) s ItemInfo=$P(ItemInfo,$C(5),1) s AddItem=$P(ItemInfo,$C(4),1) s ItemInfo=$P(ItemInfo,$C(4),2) //s AddItem="1+2+3" s BaseInfo=BaseInfo_"^"_AddItem_"^"_CTNum
d ##class(web.DHCPE.AdmRecordManager).Insert(AdmId,"P","PrintDJD",curUser,"")
s iadm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",AdmId,0)) i iadm'="" d .s PAADM=$P(^DHCPEIADM(iadm),"^",1) .;d:PAADM'="" ..PatItemPrintFlag(PAADM)
q BaseInfo_$C(4)_ItemInfo

Method.name: GetDelayItemInfo
Method.Description: 获取延检项目信息 add by wangminglong 2019-3-22 w ##class(web.DHCPE.PrintNewDirect).GetDelayItemInfo("15198")
Method.Implementation:
s ^tmplx("GetDelayItemInfo")=PreIADM /* .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1) .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) */ s ArcimIDStr="^"_"22172||1^33774||1"_"^" s NoPhotoArcimID="33649||1" s CTStation="13" s RaxStation="14" s NJStation="15" s CTNum=0 s RaxNum=0 s NJNum=0 s CTAppNum=0 s RaxAppNum=0 s NJAppNum=0 s IBInfoId=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM),"^",1) //预登记个人基本信息表 q:IBInfoId="" s IBInfo=$g(^DHCPEPreIBI(IBInfoId)) s IBSex = $P(IBInfo,"^",3) // 性别 i IBSex'="" d .s IBSex=$p($g(^CT("SEX",IBSex)),"^",2) /// 取出admid s Iadm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",PreIADM,0)) s PAADM=$P(^DHCPEIADM(Iadm),"^",1) ;s curUser=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") s curUser=7058 s BloodSpecNum=0 s OtherSpecNum=0 s BloodPatItemID="" s OtherPatItemID="" s AddItem="" s Job=$J k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job) k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job) s OtherStation=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","StationId_Other")) ;s LocID=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") s LocID=117 s NoPhotoFlag=0 if ($d(^DHCPEPatItemPrintFlag("PatItem","PrintFlag",PAADM))){ ///判断导诊单是否打印过 ADD BY YK s ItemSub=0 f s ItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)) q:ItemSub="" d .s Stat=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)),"^",16) .q:Stat'="1" .s CrmOrdID=$O(^DHCPECRMO(0,"CRMORI",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,0)) .s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) .q:(OrderItemID="")||($D(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","RefuseCheck",OrderItemID))) //add by liuxiang 2019-09-11 已经放弃的不打印 .s PrintRecord=+$O(^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,""),-1)+1 .s ^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,PrintRecord)=$H_"^"_curUser .s ItemNum=+$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","Qty",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub)) .s ArcimID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",1) .S ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID))+ItemNum .i ArcimID=NoPhotoArcimID s NoPhotoFlag="1" .s STID=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,"")) .q:(STID="")||(STID=OtherStation) .i STID=CTStation d ..s CTNum=CTNum+1 .i STID=RaxStation d ..s RaxNum=RaxNum+1 .i STID=NJStation d ..s NJNum=NJNum+1 .;PatItemID^ItemSort^ItemIsPrint^ItemPrintName .s PatItemInfo=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItemSort",ArcimID)) .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1)
.s ExeQFlag=0 .s AppFlag=0 .i CrmOrdID'="" d ..s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) ..i OrderItemID'="" d ...s SpecNo=$P(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$P(OrderItemID,"||",2),3),"^",20) ...s OEORIItemStatDR=$p($G(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$p(OrderItemID,"||",2),1)),"^",13) ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 AppFlag=1 ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 ExeQFlag=1 ...q:'$d(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","RefuseCheck",OrderItemID))&&(OEORIItemStatDR=6) /// 判断是否存在拒检项目 ...q:SpecNo="" ...q:$D(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)) ...s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)="" ...s SpecName=##class(web.DHCPE.BarPrint).GetSpecName(OrderItemID) ...i SpecName[("血") d ....s BloodSpecNum=BloodSpecNum+1 ....s BloodPatItemID=PatItemID ...e d ....s OtherSpecNum=OtherSpecNum+1 ....s OtherPatItemID=PatItemID .q:(ExeQFlag=1) .i AppFlag=1 d ..i STID=CTStation d ...s CTAppNum=CTNum+1 ..i STID=RaxStation d ...s RaxAppNum=RaxNum+1 ..i STID=NJStation d ...s NJAppNum=NJNum+1 .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) .i PatItemID'="" d ..s PatItemSort=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",2) ..s:PatItemSort="" PatItemSort="99999" .e d ..s PatItemSort="99999" .s:PatItemID="" PatItemID="99999" .s:ItemSort="" ItemSort="9999999999" .s:IsPrint="" IsPrint="Y" .s:PrintName="" PrintName=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).GetArcDesc(ArcimID)
.s SetID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",2) .s AddFlag=0 .s PostPoneFlag="" .i SetID="" d ..i AddItem="" d ...s AddItem=PrintName ..e d ...s AddItem=AddItem_"+"_PrintName ..s AddFlag=1 .e d ..s PostPoneFlag=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(+SetID,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",18) //延检标志 .q:(PostPoneFlag'="Y") ///只输出延检的项目 .s:IsPrint="N" PrintName="" .s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)=PrintName_"^"_AddFlag .b ;w5678 k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) s ItemInfo="" s PatItemSort="" f s PatItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort)) q:PatItemSort="" d .s PatItemID="" .f s PatItemID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID)) q:PatItemID="" d ..s OneInfo="" ..s PatItemName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",1) ..i PatItemName="" s PatItemName="没有分类"
..i PatItemID="5" d ;放射不出片 ...i NoPhotoFlag="1" d ....s PatItemName=PatItemName_"(不出片)"
..i PatItemID=BloodPatItemID d ...s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_BloodSpecNum_")" ..;i PatItemID=OtherPatItemID d ..;.s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_OtherSpecNum_")" ..s PatItemNotice=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID,"Place",LocID)) ..s DocFlag=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",6) ..s PatSignName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",7) ..s PatInfo=PatItemName_"^"_PatItemNotice_"^"_DocFlag_"^"_PatSignName ..s OneItemInfo="" ..s PrtFlag=0 ..s ItemSort="" ..f s ItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort)) q:ItemSort="" d ...s ArcimID="" ...f s ArcimID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) q:ArcimID="" d .... ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="男") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、前列腺超声需要憋尿" ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="女") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、妇科B超需要憋尿" ....i (ArcimIDStr[("^"_ArcimID_"^")) d .....s PrtFlag=1 ....b ;w4321 ....s OneArcInfo=$G(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) ....q:$P(OneArcInfo,"^",1)="" ....s ItemNum=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)) ....i ItemNum>1 s $p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)=$p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)_"*"_ItemNum ....i OneItemInfo="" d .....s OneItemInfo=OneArcInfo ....e d .....s OneItemInfo=OneItemInfo_$C(3)_OneArcInfo ...s:(PrtFlag=1) $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★阴式B超请先行妇科检查" ..s OneInfo=PatInfo_$C(2)_OneItemInfo ..i ItemInfo="" d ...s ItemInfo=OneInfo ..e d ...s ItemInfo=ItemInfo_$C(1)_OneInfo }else{ s ItemSub=0 f s ItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)) q:ItemSub="" d .s Stat=$P($G(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub)),"^",16) .q:Stat'="1" .s PrintRecord=+$O(^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,""),-1)+1 .s ^DHCPEDataEx("OEOrder","PatTtemHadPrint",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,PrintRecord)=$H_"^"_curUser .s ItemNum=+$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","Qty",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub)) .s ArcimID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",1) .S ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID))+ItemNum .i ArcimID=NoPhotoArcimID s NoPhotoFlag="1" .s STID=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,"")) .q:(STID="")||(STID=OtherStation) .i STID=CTStation d ..s CTNum=CTNum+1 .i STID=RaxStation d ..s RaxNum=RaxNum+1 .i STID=NJStation d ..s NJNum=NJNum+1 .;PatItemID^ItemSort^ItemIsPrint^ItemPrintName .s PatItemInfo=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItemSort",ArcimID)) .s PatItemID=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",1) .s CrmOrdID=$O(^DHCPECRMO(0,"CRMORI",PreIADM_"||"_ItemSub,0)) .s ExeQFlag=0 .s AppFlag=0 .i CrmOrdID'="" d ..s OrderItemID=$P(^DHCPECRMO(CrmOrdID),"^",1) ..i OrderItemID'="" d ...s SpecNo=$P(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$P(OrderItemID,"||",2),3),"^",20) ...s OEORIItemStatDR=$p($G(^OEORD(+OrderItemID,"I",$p(OrderItemID,"||",2),1)),"^",13) ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 AppFlag=1 ...s:OEORIItemStatDR=6 ExeQFlag=1 ...q:SpecNo="" ...q:$D(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)) ...s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job,SpecNo)="" ...s SpecName=##class(web.DHCPE.BarPrint).GetSpecName(OrderItemID) ...i SpecName[("血") d ....s BloodSpecNum=BloodSpecNum+1 ....s BloodPatItemID=PatItemID ...e d ....s OtherSpecNum=OtherSpecNum+1 ....s OtherPatItemID=PatItemID .q:(ExeQFlag=1) .i AppFlag=1 d ..i STID=CTStation d ...s CTAppNum=CTNum+1 ..i STID=RaxStation d ...s RaxAppNum=RaxNum+1 ..i STID=NJStation d ...s NJAppNum=NJNum+1 .s ItemSort=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",2) .s IsPrint=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",3) .s PrintName=$P(PatItemInfo,"^",4) .i PatItemID'="" d ..s PatItemSort=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",2) ..s:PatItemSort="" PatItemSort="99999" .e d ..s PatItemSort="99999" .s:PatItemID="" PatItemID="99999" .s:ItemSort="" ItemSort="9999999999" .s:IsPrint="" IsPrint="Y" .s:PrintName="" PrintName=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).GetArcDesc(ArcimID)
.s SetID=$P(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",2) .s AddFlag=0 .s PostPoneFlag="" .i SetID="" d ..i AddItem="" d ...s AddItem=PrintName ..e d ...s AddItem=AddItem_"+"_PrintName ..s AddFlag=1 .e d ..s PostPoneFlag=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(+SetID,"ORDITEM",ItemSub),"^",18) //延检标志 .q:(PostPoneFlag'="Y") ///只输出延检的项目 .s:IsPrint="N" PrintName="" .s ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)=PrintName_"^"_AddFlag k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectSpecNum(Job) s ItemInfo="" s PatItemSort="" f s PatItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort)) q:PatItemSort="" d .s PatItemID="" .f s PatItemID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID)) q:PatItemID="" d ..s OneInfo="" ..s PatItemName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",1) ..i PatItemName="" s PatItemName="没有分类"
..i PatItemID="5" d ;放射不出片 ...i NoPhotoFlag="1" d ....s PatItemName=PatItemName_"(不出片)"
..i PatItemID=BloodPatItemID d ...s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_BloodSpecNum_")" ..;i PatItemID=OtherPatItemID d ..;.s PatItemName=PatItemName_"("_OtherSpecNum_")" ..s PatItemNotice=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID,"Place",LocID)) ..s DocFlag=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",6) ..s PatSignName=$P($G(^DHCPEDataEx("PatItem",PatItemID)),"^",7) ..s PatInfo=PatItemName_"^"_PatItemNotice_"^"_DocFlag_"^"_PatSignName ..s OneItemInfo="" ..s PrtFlag=0 ..s ItemSort="" ..f s ItemSort=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort)) q:ItemSort="" d ...s ArcimID="" ...f s ArcimID=$O(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) q:ArcimID="" d .... ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="男") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、前列腺超声需要憋尿" ....i (PatItemID=6)&(IBSex="女") d .....s:LocID="53" $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★腹部超声需要空腹、妇科B超需要憋尿" ....i (ArcimIDStr[("^"_ArcimID_"^")) d .....s PrtFlag=1 ....b ;w12345 ....s OneArcInfo=$G(^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job,PatItemSort,PatItemID,ItemSort,ArcimID)) ....q:$P(OneArcInfo,"^",1)="" ....s ItemNum=$g(^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job,PreIADM,ArcimID)) ....i ItemNum>1 s $p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)=$p(OneArcInfo,"^",1)_"*"_ItemNum ....i OneItemInfo="" d .....s OneItemInfo=OneArcInfo ....e d .....s OneItemInfo=OneItemInfo_$C(3)_OneArcInfo ...s:(PrtFlag=1) $P(PatInfo,"^",2)="★阴式B超请先行妇科检查" ..s OneInfo=PatInfo_$C(2)_OneItemInfo ..i ItemInfo="" d ...s ItemInfo=OneInfo ..e d ...s ItemInfo=ItemInfo_$C(1)_OneInfo
} k ^TempDHCPEPrintDirect(Job) K ^TempDHCPEPrintDirectItemNum("PrintNewDirect","Qty",Job) q AddItem_$C(4)_ItemInfo_$C(5)_CTNum_"("_CTAppNum_")"_"^"_RaxNum_"("_RaxAppNum_")"_"^"_NJNum_"("_NJAppNum_")"

Method.name: PatItemPrintFlag
Method.Description: 获取延检项目的信息 add by wangminglong 2019-3-22 end

Method.name: GetPhotoPathByPAADM
Method.Implementation: s PatMasID="" s PatMasID=$P(^PAADM(PAADM),"^",1) q "http://100.100.96.248:8080/"_PatMasID_".jpg" s FTPInfo=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","PhotoFTP")) //var imgStr="ftp://"+FTPArr[1]+":"+FTPArr[2]+"@"+FTPArr[0]+":"+FTPArr[3]+"/"+FTPArr[4]+"/"+BaseInfo[7]+".jpg" s imgStr="ftp://"_$P(FTPInfo,"^",2)_":"_$P(FTPInfo,"^",3)_"@"_$P(FTPInfo,"^",1)_":"_$P(FTPInfo,"^",4)_"/"_$P(FTPInfo,"^",5)_"/"_PatMasID_".jpg" q imgStr

UDLText.name: T

Method.name: PrintFlag
Method.Description: 结算时是否打印指引单 0 不打印 1打印 w ##class(web.DHCPE.PrintNewDirect).PrintFlag(4853)
Method.Implementation: q:IADM="" "0" s PreIADM=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",4) s AdmDate=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",5) q:(+$H'=AdmDate) "0" s PAADM=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",1) s PaiedFlag=##class(web.DHCPE.HandlerPreOrds).GetPaiedFlag(PreIADM) q:PaiedFlag="0" "1^"_PAADM i PaiedFlag="1" d .k ^DHCPEPatItemPrintFlag("PatItem","PrintFlag",PreIADM) q "1^"_PAADM

Method.name: GetPhotoPath
Method.Implementation: i Type="RegNo" d .s PatientID=$O(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",ID,0)) q:PatientID="" "" s HttpInfo=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","PhotoPath")) q:HttpInfo="" "" q HttpInfo_"/"_PatientID_".jpg"
